definition: second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly

sentences.english: I need to buy a watch with a second hand.
sentences.chinese: 我要买一块有秒针的表。

sentences.english: This type of mechanism is used in clocks to power the second hand movement.
sentences.chinese: 这用机械原理用于钟表中的秒针的驱动。

sentences.english: Let the second hand suspend, awakes from the samsara, loves thorough.
sentences.chinese: 让秒针暂停，从轮回中睡醒，爱个彻底。

sentences.english: Murchison followed with his eye the hand of his chronometer.
sentences.chinese: 莫奇生的眼睛追随着他的时计的秒针。

sentences.english: He counted his cadence of cycling against the sweep second hand on his watch.
sentences.chinese: 他按照手表秒针跳动的节奏，计算着蹬车的频率。

sentences.english: The second hand of the clock was broken.
You can add a second hand to the clock, and you can customize colors.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以向时钟添加秒针，并自定义颜色。

sentences.english: The flower clock has the peculiarity to have the world's longest arm for seconds.
sentences.chinese: 花钟的独特之处是，它有着世界上最长的秒针。

definition: variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
